tool_description:
Free QR API locate google maps address.

With this API you can insert a QR in your web page that redirects to a google address.
For example, if you want to get any writed address, now is not necesary rewrite in your mobile device to find or navigate to this address. The only you need is scan this QR and mobile device gets the correct address.
name: Free QR locate google maps address Generator
title: Free QR locate google maps address Generator
tool_name: Free QR locate google maps address Generator

api_list.name: Free QR locate google maps address API

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address to find and generate QR

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://farebookings-free-qr-locate-google-maps-address-generator.p.rapidapi.com/http://devel.farebookings.com/api/qrlocator/London"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farebookings-free-qr-locate-google-maps-address-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://farebookings-free-qr-locate-google-maps-address-generator.p.rapidapi.com/http://devel.farebookings.com/api/qrlocator/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farebookings-free-qr-locate-google-maps-address-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
